# Njagih Studios

## Who
Israel Njagih — professional photographer based in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.
Operating as Njagih Studios.

## What I Do
I capture authentic moments through photography. My work spans sports, community events, weddings, corporate events, and everyday life. I take a calm, thoughtful approach to every shoot, creating an environment where people feel comfortable and moments unfold naturally. I focus on real connection and honest interaction to deliver imagery that feels authentic, intentional, and lasting.

## Services

### Wedding Photography
Full wedding day coverage, engagement sessions, documentary-style candid moments, guided couple and family portraits, ceremony and reception coverage, detail and atmosphere shots, and online gallery for viewing and downloads.

### Festival & Sports Photography
Full event-day coverage, action and candid photography, crowd and atmosphere shots, key moments and highlights, performer and athlete coverage, team and group photos, and social-media-ready images.

### Corporate Photography
Corporate event coverage, conferences and networking events, professional headshots (individual and teams), executive and leadership portraits, brand and workplace lifestyle imagery, speaker, panel and awards coverage, office and workspace photography, and images for websites, marketing, and social media.

## Location
Vancouver, BC, Canada
Coordinates: 49.2827° N, 123.1207° W

## Experience
- 3+ years of professional photography
- 70+ events covered
- 50+ happy clients
